note:
After 19 years of service I've never really had a voice online or tried to steer the world and maybe that's a bad thing.

I don't have hobbies so much as "enthusiasms" that I rotate between: RPGs, leather working, leadership, Buddhism, running, hiking, sleep, eating, and introspection.

I'm a living example of going everywhere & ending up nowhere.

What I do have is a few people in my circle that are very entertaining, a relatively dry wit, and I constantly tickle myself with puns and dad jokes.
